mapper.insert: insert into blogcontents(blog_contents_id, blog_id, blog_contents_title, blog_contents, blog_contents_view, blog_contents_like, blog_datetime, blog_contents_cover) values (#{blogContentsId}, #{blogId}, #{blogContentsTitle}, #{blogContents}, 0, 0, now(), #{blogContentsCover});
mapper.delete: delete from blogcontents where blog_id = #{blogId} and blog_contents_id = #{blogContentsId}
